SearchParameter: USCoreGoalLifecycleStatus

description : proposed | planned | accepted | active | on-hold | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | rejected
NOTE: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of capabilitystatement-expectation extension to formally express implementer conformance expectations for these elements:
- multipleAnd
- multipleOr
- comparator
- modifier
- chain

expression : Goal.lifecycleStatus
